timezone-converter.title: Time Zone Converter
timezone-converter.description: Easily convert time between different time zones around the world.
timezone-converter.howItWorks: The converter transforms time from one timezone to another using UTC (Coordinated Universal Time) offsets. It accounts for daylight saving time when applicable in certain regions.
useCases: Schedule work meetings with teams in different countries
Find the right time to call family and friends abroad
Coordinate travel schedules and international flights
Watch live sports events and global broadcasts
seoTips: Select source and target timezones accurately
Watch for daylight saving time which changes the time difference
Save frequent conversions for quick reference
commonMistakes: Forgetting daylight saving time which adds or subtracts an hour
Confusing AM and PM in 12-hour format
Not accounting for date changes during conversion

faqs.question: What is UTC (Coordinated Universal Time)?
faqs.answer: UTC is the global time standard against which all time zones are measured. It was formerly known as Greenwich Mean Time (GMT).

faqs.question: How do I find the time difference between two countries?
faqs.answer: Enter the same time in the calculator and convert between both zones. The time difference will be apparent from the result.

faqs.question: Does the time difference change throughout the year?
faqs.answer: Yes, some countries observe daylight saving time which changes the time difference with other countries by one hour.
